input.job_description:
Zarwa  Shahid  
Business  Development  Executive  
 
 
 
Contact  
Johar Town,  
Lahore  
0306 -1538612  
shahidzarwa4@gmail.com  
https://www.linkedin.com/in/zarwa - 
shahid -926986208/  
 
 
Education  
Fast  University  (2022)  
Superior  Group  of colleges  (2017)  
 
 
 
License and  
Certification  
e-commerce  Affiliate  Marketing  
(Ecommerce Pro)  
eCommerce  Sales  & Marketing  Funnels  
(Ecommerce Pro)  
Facebook  Advertising  for eCommerce  
(Ecommerce Pro)  
eCommerce Google Ads  
(Ecommerce Pro)  
WordPress  WooCommerce  
(Ecommerce  Pro)  
 
 
 
Key  Skills  
Marketing  
Lead Generation  
Proposal Writing  
Social  Media  
Planning  
WordPress  
Excellent  Communication  
IT Sales  Objective  
I am a dedicated team member who tries his best to achieve revenue  
expectations and aims to reach his goals. I take great pride in my  
communication skills, attention to detail, ability to multitask, and  
reliability. I am hard -working and punctual. I can make prob lem-solving  
decisions swiftly. I'm looking for opportunities to learn and acquire new  
skills  so I can improve  my skills for  a thriving  career  in the IT industry.  
 
 
Experience  
2022  – 2023  
Business  Development  Executive  @ Software  Pro 
Software Pro is part of a leading technology group from New York USA. 
As their  BD executive,  I am responsible  for driving  company  sales  by 
sourcing  new clients  and creating  long -term  value  for their  business  via 
BD platforms.  
 
2023  – (part  time)  
Business  Development  Executive  @ IT Cado  LLC  
• Hired  as an experienced  then  promoted  to business  development  
executive as Team lead.  
• Trained  internees  for lead  generation  and Upwork  bidding  
• Used  HubSpot  and Salesforce  to manage  leads  
• Canva  expert  | Designed  various  proposals  for clients  
• Responsible  for designing  and managing  company  portfolios  
• Used  Skype,  Slack,  Basecamp  and Jira  for client  
communication  
 
     (2023 - full time)  
    Business  Development  Executive  @Tecspine  
      
• Hired  as an experienced  then  promoted  to business  development 
executive as Team lead.  
• Responsible  for designing  and managing  company  portfolios  
• Used  Skype,  Slack,  Basecamp  and Jira for client
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates will have graduated from leading business schools such as FAST NUCES or LUMS. The company supports employee relocation within Pakistan with necessary logistical assistance. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical interviews and practical case studies aligned with industry challenges.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Economics, or related field
Strong negotiation and strategic thinking skills
